name: When Cows Fly
description:
On a foreign planet,  you are a cow collector with a magic gun.  When you shoot the cows,  gravity momentarily turns off for them.  It just does.  Magic.  Blame the planet.

Collect the normal cows from the sky before they disappear on hitting the ground(more magic),  but avoid the not normal ones(it will be very obvious which is which). 

(Work In Progress)

  • (A) : Move Left 
  • (D) : Move Left 
  • (space): Jump 
  • (LeftMouseButton/L): Shoot - in the direction you face

Feedback Appreciated!

--Brian Wu
